result.title: A set of 3D files (SHAP7 shape model with OSIRIS image texture)
result.description: A set of single 3D files (binary PLY format with an accompanying JPG texture file) for 3D display and analysis; each 3D file contains the 500K facet version of the SPG SHAP7 model, textured with one OSIRIS image. The set of files will consist of 3D files for almost all OSIRIS NAC F22 images and OSIRIS WAC F18 images showing 67P's surface.
